duties_responsibilities.duty: Follow manufacturing Batch Production Records (BPRs) and Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) in accordance with cGMPs
Document all activities in accordance with Good Documentation Practices (GDPs) in BPRs, Forms, and other quality documentation
Recognize deviations from the intended procedure and raise awareness through the Rapid Response process
Identify safety, quality, and efficiency improvements and actively participate in the Continuous Improvement Culture
May lead and engage in implementation of Continuous Improvement projects
Coach more junior team members on basic execution activities and act as an onboarding buddy to facilitate bringing new team members quickly up to speed on culture and basic workplace expectations
Participate in daily shift huddles and may lead shift exchange activities
Perform general cleanroom housekeeping, including room and equipment cleaning, disposal of waste, and maintenance of 5S standards
